Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory751.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Man', 3: "I've tallied up the supplies during the first month from the Nighter, as well as the Grubs Kowloong provided for us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you, sir.', 3: '6'}
{2: 'We might need your help again in the future.', 3: '7'}
{3: 'You take the ledger he compiled and place it on the cabinet where you currently store your paperwork.'}
{2: 'Man', 3: "It's no big deal—after all, we're practically neighbors.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Man', 3: 'Oh, right—my wife is really interested in becoming a patrol officer...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "There's a mechanoid lady at the camp who can help with registration. Just look for her.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's easier to organize our manpower that way.", 3: '14'}
{3: 'Hanying carries a simple wooden rack to the doorway, and you rush over to help her push it against the corner.'}
{3: "You compile the camp's status and borrow wooden boards from the Bixi Crew, which Hanying turns into simple shelves for paper storage."}
{3: 'Given how spotty the signal is in this region, having an extra backup is never a bad idea.'}
{2: 'Man', 3: "Thank you very much. I'll take my leave now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I appreciate your hard work.', 3: '21'}
{3: 'You check the sign-up forms on the terminal that Hanying designed. A few names are already on the list.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Everyone is far more enthusiastic than I expected.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Even the largest conservation area can't thrive without the support of the local residents.", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Apologies, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I had hoped to have you over as a guest...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'But somehow, ahem, I ended up working...', 3: '31', 4: 'I just get restless without work.', 5: '32'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Please let me make it up to you properly afterward.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "If you really mean it, I'll make sure you take a proper break.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright, moving on to the tally...', 3: '34'}
{3: 'You pick up the borrowed construction manual on the wooden desk and start flipping through it.'}
{3: 'But you quickly spot a small figure at the doorway and pause.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yalin stands by the entrance, signing a question to Hanying.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "You're not interrupting. Have a seat and take a breather here, Yalin.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'We still have a few things to take care of.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Let's come back to this later...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roughly understanding the meaning of sign language, it dawns on you that you might have been taking things too seriously.'}
{2: "Alright then, if that's the case...", 3: '50'}
{2: "There's still one more thing we need to do.", 3: '51'}
{3: 'You walk over to the short cabinet by the door and pick up a pinecone.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory559.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This should do it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying leans down to examine the ground, gently touching the soil.'}
{3: "At midday, under the blazing sun, the three of you plant a few pinecones on a small slope. Smoke rising from the camp tells you it's already noon."}
{1: '1', 3: 'You glance at Yalin—she slams down the watering bucket. This girl, barely taller than the shovel, plops right onto the ground.'}
{2: 'You did great, Yalin.', 3: '68'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'From now on, we just need to water them every few days.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She wasn't too keen on the idea of planting trees at first, but when Hanying and you set out, she ended up following you all the same."}
{3: 'She even snatches the task away when Hanying tries to help.'}
{3: 'Hanying takes a handkerchief from her pocket and wipes the sweat from your forehead.'}
{2: "It's more tiring than I imagined.", 3: '77'}
{3: 'Standing with Hanying on the slope, you have a perfect view of the old lodge complex below.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This way, once these saplings grow, we\'ll be able to see our "homeland" again.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I picked up some bamboo shoots on the way here—how about we use them for lunch today?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl watches the two people in front of her conversing, slipping into contemplation.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{1: 'Several days later'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A human girl paces around the tent assembled by mechanoids, unnoticed by the mechanoids passing by.'}
{3: "After a long moment's hesitation, she steps inside."}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory732.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'It seems the commandant of Babylonia has no intention of moving out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'That newly built house is set aside for the pair who arrived from the Aerospace City yesterday—or as humans would say, a married couple.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'Understood. My mission today is to help that couple settle in their new home and show them around the camp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Right, the Bixi Crew has already gone over to reinforce your rooftop.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "Thanks! I wouldn't want my batteries getting socked.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Repeating its assigned task, the mechanoid next to Boccioni leaves the tent.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl walks over to Boccioni and pokes him.'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Oh, my dear Sage!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Boccioni staggers back half a step and nearly topples over, but the one who really reacts more strongly is the girl.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Apologies for my lapse, Yalin.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing the mechanoid still rattled, Yalin relaxes a bit.'}
{3: 'The mechanoid before her is remarkably polite, so unlike those crazed Corrupted she recalls from her memories.'}
{3: 'As the mechanoid lets out a slightly sluggish murmur, she snaps back to reality.'}
{3: 'Boccioni tries to gather up the blueprints he knocked to the floor, but for some reason ends up colliding with the table leg instead.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Hmm... I would be most grateful if you could offer me some assistance.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl just stands there, still not fully letting go of the struggle with her memories.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'Is there something you came to ask me about?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Boccioni turns around to look at Yalin, his head swiveling a bit too dramatically before he clumsily steadies himself.'}
{3: 'She lets out a sigh and walks over to help straighten up the once-tidy table.'}
{3: 'Once everything is back in order, she picks up a blank sheet of paper from the desk and sketches an arch over a small sapling.'}

{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "So... this is a shed? We've fixed the shed already, but the first batch of potatoes won't be ready for another month, and we'll only expand the farmland after the rainy season.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yalin nods, then shakes her head. She lifts the tent flap and points toward the slope in the distance.'}
{3: 'Then she circles the sapling in her drawing and adds the pointed leaves of a pine tree.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "If I may take a wild guess, you've planted pine trees on that hillside.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'A shed can help speed up sprouting. Are you looking to grow pine saplings?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yalin nods vigorously in agreement, pointing at herself, then at the mechanoid in front of her.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "Help? I can't help right now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl looks at Boccioni with confusion.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: "This is my work shift. Planting trees isn't a higher priority than my other tasks.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: '...What about off-duty hours?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid calculates at lightning speed.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'This is a practical hobby that might spark new ideas for my other projects.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yalin approaches the mechanoid and solemnly extends her bent pinky.'}
{2: 'Boccioni', 3: 'This is how humans seal a promise, right?'}
{3: 'Because Boccioni\'s arms differ from a human\'s, he simply taps her pinky with his own "hand."'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory751.jpg'}
{1: 'Several days later'}
{3: "After spending several days learning about the camp members, you and Hanying assign each person's role. Now, the camp operates without a hitch."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hanying raises the teapot and pours the freshly steeped tea into a porcelain cup.'}
{3: 'A delicate wisp of steam drifts up from the teacup, merging with the already fragrant air.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The third cup offers the most refined taste of the entire brew.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Commandant, please.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying hands you the teacup, and the light, elegant aroma greets your senses.'}
{3: 'This morning, when the sunlight is subdued, Hanying takes out her tea set and brews a delicate pot of tea at home.'}
{3: "After two cups, the tea's aroma fills your senses. Then, with a single sip, a gentle cinnamon sweetness unfolds in the aftertaste."}
{3: 'Before long, your fatigue melts away.'}
{2: 'This tea really lives up to its name.', 3: '167', 4: 'It tastes amazing.', 5: '167'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It's been quite a busy morning, hasn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Please accept this pot of premium oolong tea as my thanks.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I guess I just got carried away with work...', 3: '170'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Commandant, make sure you don't push yourself too hard from now on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "How about we do something we've both been longing to do?", 4: '1'}
{2: "You know, I'm already satisfied with how life is right now.", 3: '173', 4: 'Being carefree is also part of a vacation.', 5: '173'}
{3: "Hanying smiles gently. She's poised and skilled as she brews tea, yet shows a hint of carefree abandon when she drinks it all in one go."}
{1: '1', 3: "The girl who's here to help Hanying make lunch taps the corner of the table."}
{2: 'Yalin', 3: '(I want some too.)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "You're still too young to drink tea, or you'll stay awake all night.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yalin', 3: '(I sleep just fine.)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Listen to Hanying.', 3: '183', 4: "(Hanying's right.)", 5: '182'}
{3: "After a last-minute study session, you've picked up enough sign language to finally communicate with Yalin on a basic level."}
{3: 'Outside, a swallow glides low and disappears into its nest beneath the eaves.'}
{3: 'Yalin takes one look at the weather outside, revealing a subtle concern that no one else seems to notice.'}
{2: 'Yalin', 3: '(I need to go out to find Boccioni.)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Huh? Boccioni?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yalin', 3: "(It's a secret!)", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Take it easy, okay?', 3: '190'}
{3: "Hanying sets down the teapot, takes her rain cape from a cabinet, and places it over Yalin's shoulders."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "It may rain later, so make sure you don't catch a cold.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yalin nods and then pours the fourth cup of tea for Hanying before heading out in a hurry.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'She used to be terrified of mechanoids.', 4: '1'}
{3: "A satisfied smile appears on Hanying's face."}
{2: 'It feels like Yalin is getting a bit more outgoing.', 3: '200', 4: 'And now she has her own little secrets.', 5: '202'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Ever since you came, she hasn't been nearly as timid around others...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Come to think of it, you're really popular with kids, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Judging by what I just saw, it must be a pretty intriguing secret, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Now that I think about it, Boccioni hides it well. You'd never guess he and Yalin have struck up a friendship.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You sip another cup, letting the warm tea chase away the lingering dampness of the rainy season.'}
{2: 'Speaking of which, we should probably...', 3: '206'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Okay, let's begin.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying neatly puts away the tea set and turns down the flame on the small burner.'}
{3: 'You two push two shipping containers together and slide the bookshelf into one corner, creating a makeshift "bedroom."'}
{3: 'The couple who usually watches over Yalin is on night duty, so Yalin is staying with you tonight.'}
{3: 'The heavy clouds outside show no sign of dispersing, though you can just make out the sunlight trying to shine through.'}
{3: "Since you can't tell the time, you use the clock on your terminal and only then realize you haven't looked at its screen for days."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "Commandant, what do you feel like eating tonight? We still have some bamboo shoots left, and there's also that package Pulao sent...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying steps into the kitchen, rummaging around to find what she needs.'}
{2: 'How about I cook tonight?', 3: '217'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Oh, I couldn't let you do that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I've got it covered. You traveled all this way, Commandant...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Really, it's no trouble.", 3: '222'}
{2: "I don't just want to support this camp; I want to do something for you as well, Hanying.", 3: '223'}
{3: 'Hanying turns her gaze on you, and a subtle, indescribable emotion stirs in her clear eyes.'}
{3: "It's almost like she's shrugging off a heavy burden, letting it melt into a gentle smile."}
{3: "Her ability to conceal her emotions is so refined that no one ever gets the chance to read what's really going on inside."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Then, how about I help you out?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Well, thanks in advance then!', 3: '229'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '7', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory751.jpg'}
{3: "The stove's warm glow fills the room, but a sudden crack of spring thunder cuts through the calm, disrupting the moment."}
{3: 'A moment later, raindrops begin to fall outside, their gentle patter audible from within.'}
{3: 'They tap against the windowsill and glass in a steady beat, but quickly shift into a frenzied, irregular drumming.'}
